name: Cycle Detection in Entity Relationships
description: Servers MUST detect and prevent infinite loops when tracking cascading entity relationships

input.mutation: mutation UpdateUser($id: ID!, $input: UpdateUserInput!) { updateUser(id: $id, input: $input) { id name manager { id name } } }

context.schema: type Mutation { updateUser(id: ID!, input: UpdateUserInput!): User } type User { id: ID! name: String! manager: User } input UpdateUserInput { name: String }
